
## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [content?](./components.expandostyles.content.md) |  | CSSProperties | <i>(Optional)</i> Content container - the panel displayed with child content once expanded. |
